name: Plaza II - Certaines exceptions s'appliquent
description: Author/Creator: Nicolas Lalonde /// Video painting of La Plaza St-Hubert, Montréal, Québec, February 2021. /// Video reel (Sony HDR-CX100) processed through LZX Industries Vidiot, projected onto a Panasonic monitor and then reshot using a Sony A5000. FFMPEG to extract the stills. Affinity Designer for matting.
